title: Mobile App Development Process
author: John Doe
contentTop:
Mobile apps have already penetrated every sphere of our lives and every imaginable business niche. Naturally, the appeal of mobile apps for its market potential cannot fade away anytime soon.

Many apps fail because of poor planning, weak development strategy, and pre-launch or post-launch mistakes.

contentBottom.heading: How It Works
paragraphs: Front-end development focuses on the visual perception of a website including look, load time, and interaction.
Front-End is a mix of programming and layout that powers the visuals and interactions on the web.
Talented developers provide turnkey front-end services whether upgrading to modern frameworks like Angular or building from scratch.

contentBottom.heading: Process & Results
paragraphs: DevOps transformed development by integrating operations with development.
Security later became part of the lifecycle through DevSecOps.
Integrating security with DevOps requires different tools and processes but significantly reduces vulnerabilities.
